name: Pokemon #26: Raichu LV40
text:
(This card is always treated as a "Stage 1 Pokemon" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set, unless you Tribute 1 "Pikachu" monster that was Summoned at least 1 turn before this turn. Once per turn, you can activate this effect:
? Flip a coin: If heads, during your opponent's next turn, this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects, cannot be destroyed by battle, and you take no battle damage in battles involving this card until the End Phase.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
